pages.body:
# List of Zites: Discussion | [[zite-list-discussion-talk|Talk]]

### Zites that provide visitors with a means of social networking can be considered a discussion site.

* [ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/).  (English)  
Similar to Reddit, ZeroTalk is the original release of a social platform. The zite operates in a decentralized forum fashion containing topics and subtopics. Visitors who have registered with a [[ZeroID]] are able to post comments and replies. Visitors can edit or delete their own comment by clicking the small pencil icon found the to left of their post body and subject title.
    * Zite Address: 1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT  
    * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
    * Zite Domain: Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit  
    * Zite Language: English, Various
